Summary: The Day 2 workshop instruction outlines the task of implementing a system to answer user questions and determine their intent. The user input and desired system output format should be similar, with optional outputs including any existing responses in the training data and new responses generated by models. Examples of user input and their respective intents and outputs are provided, such as adding an album to a playlist or searching for a show. The system should also be able to identify and fill in any other relevant slots or values.
